languages.text: {n}Среди дворян рождается злобный ропот. Кто-то с ужасом повторяет имя погибшего губернатора, кто-то с надеждой просит вас прикончить бесноватого стража, кто-то хрипло сулит Малгару вечные муки. Но никто не осмеливается возвысить голос и ответить вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Среди дворян рождается злобный ропот. Кто-то с ужасом повторяет имя погибшего губернатора, кто-то с надеждой просит вас прикончить бесноватого стража, кто-то хрипло сулит Малгару вечные муки. Но никто не осмеливается возвысить голос и ответить вам.{/n}

languages.text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Среди дворян рождается злобный ропот. Кто-то с ужасом повторяет имя погибшего губернатора, кто-то с надеждой просит вас прикончить бесноватого стража, кто-то хрипло сулит Малгару вечные муки. Но никто не осмеливается возвысить голос и ответить вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are repeating the governor's name with horror, others are asking with hope in their voice to kill the raving soldier, and some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

{n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are repeating the governor's name with horror, others are asking with hope in their voice to kill the raving soldier, and some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

{n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

{n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

{n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein zorniges Raunen geht durch die Gruppe der Aristokraten. Einige murmeln entsetzt den Namen des verstorbenen Gouverneurs, andere flehen dich an, den wahnsinnigen Soldaten zu töten, wieder andere wünschen Malgar mit rauer Stimme ewige Qualen. Doch keiner wagt es, seine Stimme zu erheben und Euch zu antworten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein zorniges Raunen geht durch die Gruppe der Aristokraten. Einige murmeln entsetzt den Namen des verstorbenen Gouverneurs, andere flehen dich an, den wahnsinnigen Soldaten zu töten, wieder andere wünschen Malgar mit rauer Stimme ewige Qualen. Doch keiner wagt es, seine Stimme zu erheben und Euch zu antworten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un murmure de colère gronde parmi le groupe de nobles. Certains marmonnent le nom du gouverneur avec horreur, d'autres vous supplient de tuer le garde dément, d'autres encore maudissent Malgar à voix basse, lui promettant un tourment éternel... mais aucun n'ose lever la voix pour vous répondre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un murmure de colère gronde parmi le groupe de nobles. Certains marmonnent le nom du gouverneur avec horreur, d'autres vous supplient de tuer le garde dément, d'autres encore maudissent Malgar à voix basse, lui promettant un tourment éternel... mais aucun n'ose lever la voix pour vous répondre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}贵族之中爆发出了一连串愤怒的窃窃私语。有些人惊恐地呼喊着已故总督的名字，有些人恳求你杀死这个精神错乱的卫兵，还有些人嘶哑地诅咒马尔加，希望他永远受到折磨。然而，没人敢提高嗓门，直接回答你的问题。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}贵族之中爆发出了一连串愤怒的窃窃私语。有些人惊恐地呼喊着已故总督的名字，有些人恳求你杀死这个精神错乱的卫兵，还有些人嘶哑地诅咒马尔加，希望他永远受到折磨。然而，没人敢提高嗓门，直接回答你的问题。{/n}

languages.text: {n}貴族たちが怒りにどよめく。ある者は恐怖のあまり、死亡した総督の名を口にし、ある者は狂った所長を殺すよう懇願し、ある者はしわがれた声でマルガーの永遠の苦しみを願う。しかし、果敢にも声を上げてあなたに答えようとする者はいない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族たちが怒りにどよめく。ある者は恐怖のあまり、死亡した総督の名を口にし、ある者は狂った所長を殺すよう懇願し、ある者はしわがれた声でマルガーの永遠の苦しみを願う。しかし、果敢にも声を上げてあなたに答えようとする者はいない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un murmullo furioso recorre el grupo de nobles. Algunos pronuncian horrorizados el nombre del gobernador fallecido, otros te suplican que mates al guardia trastornado, y algunos desean a gritos el castigo eterno para Malgar. Pero ninguno se atreve a levantar la voz y responderte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un murmullo furioso recorre el grupo de nobles. Algunos pronuncian horrorizados el nombre del gobernador fallecido, otros te suplican que mates al guardia trastornado, y algunos desean a gritos el castigo eterno para Malgar. Pero ninguno se atreve a levantar la voz y responderte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soylular arasında öfkeli bir mırıltı dolanıyor. Kimi, merhum valinin adını dehşetle sayıklarken kimi, deli askeri öldürmen için yalvarıyor. Kimiyse Malgar'a cehennem azabı diliyor. Lakin hiçbiri sesini yükseltip de sana cevap vermeye cesaret edemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An angry murmur runs through the group of nobles. Some are uttering the deceased governor's name in horror, others are begging you to kill the deranged warden, some are hoarsely wishing eternal torment upon Malgar. But none dare to raise their voice and answer you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soylular arasında öfkeli bir mırıltı dolanıyor. Kimi dehşet ile merhum valinin adını sayıklıyor, kimi deli askeri öldürmen için sana yalvarıyor, kimiyse Malgar'a cehennem azabı diliyor. Lakin hiçbiri sesini çıkarıp sana cevap vermeye cesaret edemiyor.{/n}
